column5: Newman staff will use all available resources to prepare our students to\rachieve academic success and attain good citizenship.\r\rOur purpose is:\r•To create enthusiasm for learning so that students become college and career ready\r------\r•To build strong academic skills through consistent instructional rigor\r--\r•To foster positive self-esteem and pride\rChino Valley Unified School\r•To communicate in an appropriate manner (orally
column7: and socially)\rDistrict\r•To apply competency and common sense in technology and real-world situations\r5130 Riverside Drive\r•To encourage school spirit\rChino
